member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource
member.summary: Instances of the Resource class contain information about arbitrary resources.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Resource class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the resource data to a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the BinaryWriter class that allows writing primitive data types to a binary stream.

An instance of the BinarySerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: Call LoadFrom when you want to restore the Resource from the stream.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads resource data from a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the System.IO.BinaryReader class that allows reading primitive data types from a binary stream.

An instance of the BinarySerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method loads data from a stream saved with a previous call to the SaveTo method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the resource data to an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlElement class that allows adding data to the XML document.

An instance of the XmlSerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method saves Resource data as elements of an XML document.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads resource data from an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlElement class that allows reading data from the XML document.

An instance of the XmlSerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method loads an XML document that was stored by a previous call to the SaveTo method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of the Resource object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific format information.
member.param: An IFormatProvider that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
member.remarks: The provider parameter is typically a DateTimeFormatInfo object or a CultureInfo object that contains a DateTimeFormatInfo object. If provider is null, the DateTimeFormatInfo associated with the current culture is used. For more information, see System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.
member.returns: A string representation of value of the Resource object as specified by provider.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.Equals(System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified Object is equal to the current Object.
member.param: The object to compare with the current object.
member.returns: true if the specified Object is equal to the current Object; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Serves as a hash function for the Resource type.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets the string identifier for this resource.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the resource.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets custom data associated with the resource.
member.remarks: Use the property to store your custom data. The tag can be anything from a primitive data type value to a complex object from the .NET class library to a class defined by you. If the tag is an instance of a value type, it will be serialized together with the object containing it when saving / loading the schedule. Reference types are serialized if marked with the [Serializable] attribute or if they implement the ISerializable interface.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.ViewState
member.summary: Gets a dictionary of state information that allows you to save and restore the view state of the Resource across multiple requests for the same page.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Resource.IsTrackingViewState
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the Resource is saving changes to its view state.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Task class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves task data to a binary stream.
member.param: A System.IO.BinaryWriter class that allows writing primitive data types to the binary stream.

A BinarySerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method saves task data as elements in an XML document. Later they can be restored with the the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads task data from a binary stream.
member.param: A System.IO.BinaryReader class that allows reading primitive data types from the binary stream.

A BinarySerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method loads task data from a binary stream where it was previously saved by SaveTo.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the task data to an XML document.
member.param: A System.Xml.XmlElement object that allows adding data to the XML document.

An XmlSerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method saves the task properties as elements in an XML document. Later they can be restored with the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Task.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads task data from an XML document.
member.param: A System.Xml.XmlElement that allows reading data from the XML document.

A XmlSerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method loads task data from an XML document where it was previously saved by SaveTo.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.Calendar.CurrentView
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the calendar view.
member.remarks: The control can display the schedule data in several different types of views. This property allows changing the current view and can be used to implement drill down into the schedule data by switching from more general to more specialized views.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.Calendar.AllowInplaceEdit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether users are allowed to edit items interactively.
member.remarks: If this property is disabled, users cannot edit item's text interactively. Controlling the editing of item text can be done by handling the ItemInplaceEditStarting and ItemInplaceEditEnding events.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.Calendar.ContactNameFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets how to format and display contact names in the timetable header.
member.remarks: Use the capital letters F, M and L as placeholders for the First, Middle and Last names. Any other character will be displayed unchanged.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.Calendar.ItemChangeResourceKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the modifier key, which lets users drag items between different contacts, resources, locations or tasks in a grouped view.
member.remarks: By default an item dragged in a grouped view can be dropped into any column (associated with different or the original resource). This behavior can be overridden by setting this property to a value different from Keys.None so that the dragged item can be dropped only in a column, associated with the original contact, location, task or resource.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.UniqueItem
member.summary: This class wraps a MindFusion.Scheduling.Item in such way, that comparing for equality with the same occurrence of a recurring item reports true, although the occurrence might be an instance from a different generation.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the UniqueItem class.

member.summary: Checks whether this instance represents the specified item.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.UniqueItem.Represents(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Checks whether this instance represents the specified item. The second parameter specifies whether the exception of the same occurrence of a recurring item is considered different than the occurrence itself.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.UniqueItem.Item
member.summary: Gets a reference to the wrapped item (if the wrapped item is not a recurring item) or its master (if the wrapped item is a recurring item).

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.UniqueItem.TrueItem
member.summary: Gets the actual item used to create this instance.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.UniqueItem.RecurrenceIndex
member.summary: Gets the occurrence index of the wrapped item, or -1 if the wrapped item is not a recurring item.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the main header.

member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum size of the header displaying all-day items.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the group header.
member.remarks: A value of 0 causes the calendar to automatically calculate a header size based on the size of the header font.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.TimelineSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the timeline header.

member.summary: Gets or sets the size of cells that represent the time.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ColumnBandSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the size of the bands displayed on the left/top side of each timetable column.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.HeaderDateFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the format of dates displayed in the timetable header.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.GeneralFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the string to use when formatting times in the timeline.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.TwelveHourFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use a 12-hour format.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ShowDayHeader
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the header displaying all-day items.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ShowNavigationButtons
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Timetable view displays navigation buttons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ShowExpandButton
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Timetable view displays expand header button.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.StartTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the start time of the timetable, expressed in minutes since the beginning of the day.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.EndTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the end time of the timetable, expressed in minutes since the beginning of the day.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.RealEndTime
member.summary: Gets the real end time, i.e. if EndTime is greater than StartTime, returns EndTime, otherwise, returns EndTime + 1440.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.CellTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time length of a single cell in a timetable view, accurate to the nearest second.
member.remarks: Valid values for this property range from 1 second to 1 day.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.GroupHours
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether hours displayed in the timeline are grouped.
member.remarks: Certain conditions prevent hours from grouping, such as when the hours are not divisible by the specified CellTime.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ShowWorkTime
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether work time is displayed with different style.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.EnableWorkOnWeekends
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to color the work-time cells in weekend days.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ShowAM
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the AM and PM suffixes are displayed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ShowMinutesInHourHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display the minutes of each hour in the timeline header when it displays whole hour cells.
member.remarks: Whole hour cells are displayed when the hours are divisible by the specified CellTime.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.WorkTimeStartHour
member.summary: Gets or sets the start hour of the work time interval.
member.remarks: This property and WorkTimeEndHour specify the working time period, whose cells are usually displayed in a different style as set in WorkTimeCellStyle. To use the same style for all cells in the timetable view, set WorkTimeCellStyle to a new empty Style.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.WorkTimeEndHour
member.summary: Gets or sets the end hour of the work time interval.
member.remarks: This property and WorkTimeStartHour specify the working time period, whose cells are usually displayed in a different style as set in WorkTimeCellStyle. To use the same style for all cells in the timetable view, set WorkTimeCellStyle to a new empty Style.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ClockAbbreviationColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of AM and PM clock abbreviation

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.TimelineTicksColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of ticks in a Timetable timeline.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.MinuteFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets how to format and display minutes.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ReverseGrouping
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grouping (if enabled) will be performed first by the resource, and then by the date.
member.remarks: By default grouping is done first by available dates, then by the resources specified in the current grouping type. Setting this property to Enabled reverses this behavior.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ScrollStep
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days to scroll when the user clicks the navigation buttons.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.ItemOffset
member.summary: Gets or set the distance between the first item and its adjoining cell side.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.MaxAllDayItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of all-day items visible at a time in the column headers.
member.remarks: The all-day items header is automatically resized to hold all items up to the number set in this property.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.HeaderExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the header is expanded.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableSettings.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cells are displayed horizontally or vertically.

member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for daily recurrences with DailyRecurrence set to ByDayInterval and Days value set to 1.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceDailyTwoPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for daily recurrences with DailyRecurrence set to ByDayInterval and Days value set to more than 1.
member.remarks: Use the [Days] parameter as a placeholder for the Recurrence.Days value.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceDailyThreePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for daily recurrences with DailyRecurrence set to EveryWorkday.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceDailyFourPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for daily recurrences with DailyRecurrence set to EveryWeekend.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceWeeklyOnePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for weekly recurrences with Weeks value set to 1.
member.remarks: Use the [DaysOfWeek] parameter as a placeholder for the Recurrence.DaysOfWeek value.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceWeeklyTwoPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for weekly recurrences with Weeks value set to more than 1.
member.remarks: Use the [DaysOfWeek] and [Weeks] parameters as placeholders for the Recurrence.DaysOfWeek and Recurrence.Weeks values respectively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceMonthlyOnePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for monthly recurrences with MonthlyRecurrence set to ByDayNumber.
member.remarks: Use the [DayOfMonth] and [Months] parameters as placeholders for the Recurrence.DayOfMonth and Recurrence.Months values respectively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceMonthlyTwoPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for monthly recurrences with MonthlyRecurrence set to ByDayType.
member.remarks: Use the [Occurrence], [Day] and [Months] parameters as placeholders for the Recurrence.Occurrence, Recurrence.Day and Recurrence.Months values respectively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceYearlyOnePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for yearly recurrences with YearlyRecurrence set to SpecificDate.
member.remarks: Use the [MonthOfYear] and [DayOfMonth] parameters as placeholders for the Recurrence.MonthOfYear and Recurrence.DayOfMonth values respectively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceYearlyTwoPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for yearly recurrences with YearlyRecurrence set to ByDayType.
member.remarks: Use the [Occurrence], [Day] and [MonthOfYear] parameters as placeholders for the Recurrence.Occurrence, Recurrence.Day and Recurrence.MonthOfYear values respectively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceIntervalPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for recurrences with RecurrencePattern set to TimeInterval.
member.remarks: Use the [Interval.Days], [Interval.Hours], [Interval.Minutes] and [Interval.Seconds] parameters as placeholders for the Recurrence.Interval.Days, Recurrence.Interval.Hours, Recurrence.Interval.Minutes and Recurrence.Interval.Seconds values respectively.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceStartDatePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for denoting the start date of a recurrence.
member.remarks: Use the [StartDate] parameter as a placeholder for the Recurrence.StartDate value.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceEndDatePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for denoting the end date of a recurrence.
member.remarks: Use the [EndDate] parameter as a placeholder for the return value from the Recurrence.GetEndDate() method.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceTimeOnePattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for denoting the start and end time of a recurrence.
member.remarks: Use the [StartTime] and [EndTime] parameters as placeholders for the StartTime and EndTime of recurrences.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.LocalizationInfo.RecurrenceTimeTwoPattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern used for denoting the time of a recurrence.
member.remarks: Use the [StartTime] parameter as a placeholder for the StartTime of recurrences.

member.summary: Gets the zero-based index of the occurrence being validated.
member.remarks: At the time the item is being validated, it is still not marked as occurrence and its Item.RecurrenceIndex property returns -1. Therefore you need to use this property to obtain the actual recurrence index of the item. This is done to allow you to change any of the item's properties without forcing it to become an exception.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.SaveTo(System.String,MindFusion.Scheduling.ContentType)
member.summary: Saves the schedule to a file.
member.param: The path of the file to save to.
One of the ContentType enumeration values that specifies the format of the file.
member.remarks: Saves the schedule data into a binary or XML file. Use LoadFrom to restore the data later.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.LoadFrom(System.String,MindFusion.Scheduling.ContentType)
member.summary: Loads the schedule data from a file.
member.param: A string that specifies the name of the file, which holds the data.
An instance of the ContentType enumeration.
member.remarks: This method loads the schedule data from a file where it was previously saved by a call to SaveTo. Any data contained in the schedule is discarded before the items stored in the file are loaded.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.SaveToStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Saves the schedule to a binary stream.
member.param: The stream to save the schedule to.
member.remarks: Saves the schedule data as bytes in a binary stream. Use LoadFromStream to restore the data later.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.LoadFromStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads schedule data from a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the System.IO.Stream class that contains the data.
member.remarks: This method loads data from a binary stream, which was created by calling SaveToStream. Any data contained in the schedule is discarded before the items stored in the stream are loaded.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.SaveToXml(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Saves the schedule to an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlDocument class that contains the data.
member.remarks: Saves the schedule data as tags in an XML document. Use LoadFromXml to restore the schedule data later.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.LoadFromXml(System.Xml.XmlDocument)
member.summary: Loads schedule data from an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlDocument that holds the schedule data.
member.remarks: This method loads data from an XML file created by a previous call to SaveTo. Any data contained in the schedule is discarded before the items stored in the reader are loaded.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.SaveToString(MindFusion.Scheduling.ContentType)
member.summary: Saves the schedule data into a string.
member.param: One of the ContentType enumeration values, which specifies the data format.
member.returns: A string that represents the schedule data.
member.remarks: Saves the schedule data into a base64-encoded string. Use LoadFromString to restore the data later.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.LoadFromString(System.String,MindFusion.Scheduling.ContentType)
member.summary: Loads data for the schedule from a string.
member.param: A string that contains the schedule data.
One of the ContentType enumeration values, which specifies the format of the data to load.
member.remarks: This method loads data saved to string with the SaveToString method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.GetAllItems(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of all events, including recurrent item instances, scheduled to occur in the specified time interval.
member.param: Time interval start.
Time interval end.
member.returns: A collection that contains the events scheduled to occur in the specified period.
member.remarks: If a recurring event occurs in the specified interval, each occurrence is represented by an Item instance whose RecurrenceState is set to RecurrenceState.Occurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Schedule.GetAllItems(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,MindFusion.Scheduling.Contact)

member.param: Specifies the start of the time period.
Specifies the end of the time period.
A Contact instance that must be related to the items.
member.returns: A collection that contains the events scheduled to occur in the specified period for the specified contact.
member.remarks: If a recurring event occurs in the specified interval, each occurrence is represented by an Item instance whose RecurrenceState is set to RecurrenceState.Occurrence.

Specifies the end of the time period.

member.returns: A collection that contains the events scheduled to occur in the specified period for the specified resource.
member.remarks: If a recurring event occurs in the specified interval, each occurrence is represented by an Item instance whose RecurrenceState is set to Occurrence.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView
member.summary: Specifies the type of view to display in a calendar control.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView.MonthRange
member.summary: The calendar displays several months in a grid. The days of each month are visible too.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView.SingleMonth
member.summary: The calendar displays a single month at a time. The days of the month are displayed in a grid.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView.WeekRange
member.summary: The calendar displays a grid of days, with the columns representing the week days from Monday to Sunday and the rows representing weeks.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView.List
member.summary: The calendar displays several seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months or years in a row.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView.Timetable
member.summary: The calendar displays a timetable where each row represents a fixed arbitrary time interval and each column represents a day. This view allow further division by various grouping criteria such as contacts, locations or tasks.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.CalendarView.ResourceView
member.summary: The calendar displays the distribution of items over a period of time.

member.returns: The newly created Appointment.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the appointment data to a binary stream.
member.param: A System.IO.BinaryWriter object that allows writing primitive data types to a binary stream.

A BinarySerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads appointment data from a binary stream.
member.param: A System.IO.BinaryReader object that allows reading primitive data types from a binary stream.

A BinarySerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.

member.summary: Saves the appointment data to an XML document.
member.param: A System.Xml.XmlElement object that allows adding data to the XML document.

An XmlSerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)

An XmlSerializationContext object that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.

member.summary: Gets or sets header text displayed for this appointment by the calendar control.

member.summary: Gets or sets text with details displayed for this appointment by the scheduling control.
member.remarks: This property implements the DescriptionText property of the Item class and is equivalent to Details.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Subject
member.summary: Gets or sets the subject of this appointment.
member.remarks: This is equivalent to the HeaderText property.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Details
member.summary: Gets or sets the description of this appointment.
member.remarks: This property is equivalent to DescriptionText.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Attendees
member.summary: Gets a list with all attendees of this appointment.
member.remarks: This property is equivalent to Contacts.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Reminder
member.summary: Gets or sets the reminder for this appointment.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Style
member.summary: Gets or sets the style associated with this appointment.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the appointment is visible.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.CssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the css class of the appointment.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Appointment.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets custom data associated with the appointment.
member.remarks: Use this property to store your custom data. The tag can be a value from a primitive data type or a complex object from the .NET class library or a class defined by you. If the tag is an instance of a value type, it will be serialized together with the object containing it when saving / loading the schedule. Reference types are serialized if marked with the [Serializable] attribute or if they implement the ISerializable interface.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext.document
member.summary: The underlying document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext.brushes
member.summary: A map of all diagram brushes.
member.remarks: During serialization, this map will contain all serialized brushes, mapped to their indices. During deserialization, the brushes are loaded from the appropriate section in the Xml file, the first time they are accessed. This list is of type (Brush, int) when serializing and of type (int, Brush) when deserializing.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext.images
member.summary: A map of all diagram images.
member.remarks: During serialization, this map will contain all serialized images, mapped to their indices. During deserialization, the images are loaded from the appropriate section in the Xml file, the first time they are accessed. This list is of type (Image, int) when serializing and of type (int, Image) when deserializing.

member.summary: Defines recurrence patterns for items scheduled to repeat over and over again.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Recurrence class.

member.summary: Returns a string that represents this recurrence using the specified date and time formatting info.
member.param: Specifies how date and time values are formatted and displayed.
member.returns: A string that represents the Recurrence object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents this Recurrence using the date and time formatting information defined in the current culture.
member.returns: A string representation of this Recurrence object.

Specifies localized strings used in the representation.
member.returns: A localized string representation of this Recurrence object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Clone
member.summary: Creates an exact copy of this Recurrence object.
member.returns: A new Recurrence object, identical to the current one.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.SamePatternAs(MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence)
member.summary: Determines whether two Recurrence objects define the same recurrence pattern.
member.param: A Recurrence object to compare with this recurrence.
member.returns: true if the Recurrence instances have the same recurrence pattern; otherwise false.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ApplyPattern(MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence)
member.summary: Copies the property values of the specified Recurrence object as values for the properties of this Recurrence object.
member.param: The Recurrence object whose fields to copy.
member.remarks: This method behaves similarly to the Clone method but does not create a new object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetEndDate
member.summary: Returns the end date for this recurrence.
member.remarks: The end date is calculated based on the specified repeat number if RecurrenceEnd is set to NumOccurrences.
member.returns: The end date of the recurrence if the recurrence is set to expire or DateTime.MaxValue otherwise.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the recurrence data to a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the BinaryWriter class that allows writing primitive data types to the binary stream.

An instance of the BinarySerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method saves the recurrence properties as bytes in a binary stream. Use the LoadFrom method to restore the recurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads the recurrence data from a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the System.IO.BinaryReader class that reads primitive data types from the binary stream.

An instance of the BinarySerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: Loads the state of a recurrence from a binary stream where it was previously saved with SaveTo.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the recurrence data to an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlElement class that allows adding data to the XML document.

An instance of the XmlSerializationContext that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: The recurrence properties are saved as elements of an XML document, and can later be restored with the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads the recurrence data from an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlElement class that allows reading data from the XML document.

An instance of the XmlSerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: Loads the state of a recurrence from an XML document, where it was previously saved with the SaveTo method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.AssociateWith(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item)
member.summary: Associates the recurrence with the specified item. If the supplied reference is null, the recurrence is detached from the currently associated master.

member.summary: Resets the recurrence and raises the event.

member.summary: Raises the ValidateOccurrence event to validate the generation of the specified occurrence.

member.summary: Raises the ValidateOccurrence event.
member.param: An object, containing the event data.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetDayOfTheMonth(System.DateTime,MindFusion.Scheduling.Occurrence,MindFusion.Scheduling.DayOfWeekType)
member.summary: Retrieves the number of the appropriate day within the specified month.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GotoFirstOccurrence(System.DateTime,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Locates and returns the date of the first occurrence after the specified date.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetNextOccurrence(System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Adjusts the date to the date of the next occurrence right after or at the specified date.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetNextOccurrence(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Gets the occurrence right after or at the specified start date. This function ignores the end date of the recurrence so it will always return a valid item.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetOccurrence(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the occurrence with the specified index.
member.param: The zero based index of the occurrence to retrieve.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.
member.remarks: This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetOccurrence(System.Int32,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Returns the occurrence having the specified index.
member.param: The zero based index of the occurrence to retrieve.
If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter indicates upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.
member.remarks: This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GetOccurrence(System.Int32,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the occurrence with the specified index.
member.param: The index of the occurrence to retrieve.
If the specified occurrence is an exception, this parameter indicates upon function completion whether the exception is deleted or not.
Specifies whether to return the original item, in case this occurrence is an exception.
member.returns: A reference to the occurrence with the specified index or null, if there is no such occurrence.
member.remarks: This function might take considerable amount of time if you specify a large index in an infinite recurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.GenerateItems(System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Creates occurrence items for this Recurrence in the specified date range.
member.param: The range start date.
The range end date.
member.returns: A collection of Item instances representing each occurrence of the recurrent event in the specified date range.
member.remarks: The Calendar control uses this method to generate item occurrences when a recurrent item must be displayed in the current view.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.ClearExceptions
member.summary: Removes all exceptions of this Recurrence.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.MarkException(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,System.Boolean,MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder)
member.summary: Handle changed reminders in exceptions

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.MarkException(MindFusion.Scheduling.Item,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Marks the specified item as an exception in the Recurrence pattern.
member.param: The Item to be marked as an exception.
Specifies whether the exception is created by deleting one occurrence from the recurrent pattern or by changing the occurrence time properties.
member.remarks: The Calendar control calls this method when a user drags an occurrence item or edits its text, thus creating an exception of the recurrence.

member.summary: Removes the exception associated with the specified item from the recurrence.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Pattern
member.summary: Gets or sets the recurrence pattern.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.DailyRecurrence
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of daily recurrence.
member.remarks: This property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Daily.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.MonthlyRecurrence
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of monthly recurrence.
member.remarks: The property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Monthly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.YearlyRecurrence
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of yearly recurrence.
member.remarks: This property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Yearly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Days
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of days between two consecutive occurrences of the same event.
member.remarks: This value is used when the recurrence Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Daily.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.DayOfMonth
member.summary: Gets or sets the day of the month when the event occurs.
member.remarks: This property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Monthly or RecurrencePattern.Yearly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Weeks
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of weeks between two consecutive occurrences of the event.
member.remarks: The property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Weekly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.DaysOfWeek
member.summary: Gets or sets the days of the week when the event occurs.
member.remarks: This property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Weekly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Months
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of months between two consecutive occurrences of the same event.
member.remarks: The property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Monthly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.MonthOfYear
member.summary: Gets or sets the month of the year when the event occurs.
member.remarks: The property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Yearly.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Occurrence
member.summary: Gets or sets on which occurrence of the week within the month the event occurs.
member.remarks: The property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Monthly or RecurrencePattern.Yearly and the MonthlyRecurrence or YearlyRecurrence properties are set to MonthlyRecurrence.ByDayType.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Day
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the day of the week when the event occurs.
member.remarks: The property is used when Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.Monthly or RecurrencePattern.Yearly and the MonthlyRecurrence or YearlyRecurrence properties are set to MonthlyRecurrence.ByDayType.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.Interval
member.summary: Gets or sets the interval of recurrence.
member.remarks: The property is used when the Pattern is set to RecurrencePattern.ByTimeInterval.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.StartDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the date and time of the event's first occurrence.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.RecurrenceEnd
member.summary: Gets or sets the last time when the event occurs.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.NumOccurrences
member.summary: Gets or sets how many times a recurring event should occur.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Scheduling.Recurrence.EndDate
member.summary: Gets or sets the end date of the recurrence.
member.remarks: The property is used when RecurrenceEnd is set to RecurrenceEnd.EndDate.

member.summary: Converts the value of the TimetableDate object to its equivalent string representation.
member.remarks: The value of the TimetableDate object is formatted using the general date and time format specifier ('G'). This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. For more information, see System.Globalization.CurrentCulture.
member.returns: A string representation of the value of the current TimetableDate object.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableDate.ToString(System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of the TimetableDate object to its equivalent string representation using the specified culture-specific format information.
member.param: An IFormatProvider that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
member.remarks: The provider parameter is typically a DateTimeFormatInfo object or a CultureInfo object that contains a DateTimeFormatInfo object. If provider is null, the DateTimeFormatInfo associated with the current culture is used. For more information, see System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.
member.returns: A string representation of value of the TimetableDate object as specified by provider.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableDate.ToString(System.String)
member.summary: Converts the value of the TimetableDate object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format.
member.param: A DateTime format string.
member.remarks: The format parameter should contain either a format specifier character or a custom format pattern. For more information, see the summary page for System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo. If format is null or an empty string, the general format specifier, 'G', is used.
member.returns: A string representation of value of the TimetableDate object as specified by format.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.WebForms.TimetableDate.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Converts the value of the current TimetableDate object to its equivalent string representation using the specified format and culture-specific format information.
member.param: A DateTime format string.
An IFormatProvider that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
member.remarks: The format parameter can contain either a format specifier character or a custom format pattern. For more information, see the summary page for System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo. If format is null or an empty string (""), the standard format specifier, 'G', is used. The provider parameter is typically a DateTimeFormatInfo object or an instance of CultureInfo, which contains a DateTimeFormatInfo object. If provider is null, the DateTimeFormatInfo associated with the current culture is used. For more information, see System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.
member.returns: A string representation of value of the current TimetableDate object as specified by format and provider.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.SaveTo(System.IO.BinaryWriter,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the reminder data to a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the System.IO.BinaryWriter class that allows writing primitive data types to the binary stream.

An instance of the BinarySerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method saves reminder data as bytes in a binary stream. They can be restored later with the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.LoadFrom(System.IO.BinaryReader,MindFusion.Scheduling.BinarySerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads reminder data from a binary stream.
member.param: An instance of the System.IO.BinaryReader class that reads primitive data types from the binary stream.

An instance of the BinarySerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the stream.
member.remarks: This method loads reminder data from a binary stream where it was previously saved with the SaveTo method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.SaveTo(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Saves the reminder data to an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.IO.XmlElement class that allows adding data to the XML document.

An instance of the XmlSerializationContext class that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method saves reminder data as elements in an XML document. It can be restored later using the LoadFrom method.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Scheduling.Reminder.LoadFrom(System.Xml.XmlElement,MindFusion.Scheduling.XmlSerializationContext)
member.summary: Loads reminder data from an XML document.
member.param: An instance of the System.Xml.XmlElement class that allows reading data from the XML document.

An instance of the XmlSerializationContext that contains the file format revision number of the schedule being loaded. It also provides methods that facilitate reading and writing various data types from and to the XML document.
member.remarks: This method loads reminder data from an XML document, where it was previously saved with the SaveTo method.
